title: Is it just me or does Luxs Q and R hit box not line up with the visuals?
body: No MAtter if I'm playing Lux or against her I always feel like both of these abilities hit so many times when people are so far away from the visuals. An update on the visual or the hitbox needs to happen so you can feel like you are properly dodging it.

replies.body: Also, don't forget Steel Legion lux, has nearly invisible projectile indicators.

inconsitent hit box and some skins are extremely worse off then others, lux also has a "back blast" on her ult from behind her and with her Q since the actual "start" of these spells is from her center rather then in front where the particles show up, think of this like how old blitz Q fired vs now, now it fires from his right side always slightly infront but lux particle is so big and her model so small she can hit someone right behind her with binding and ult , the newest skin suffers from the misleading hitbox the most since their have been 0 particles even close to me sometimes and i get hit

spirit brand also has this issues + the particles for the passive are very muted so he can conflagration and you might not notice
100% inconsistent hitboxes, riot needs to do a mini re-work to lux, purely to make the visuals and hitboxes align better, the only one I haven't seen any problems with is her w.
